item.description: âœ‹ Hi, I’m Yu Zhang é“¾æ¥åˆ°æ ‡é¢˜ I’m Yu Zhang, Blockchain Developer, MSc Graduate in ECIC(Electronic Commerce and Internet Computing) @ The University of Hong Kong (HKU). Love to learn and build things. Follow me on GitHub. Know me on Telegram Channel. I want to learn things and become a better person. I enjoy reading, thinking and writing in my leisure time. ğŸ“ My Goals é“¾æ¥åˆ°æ ‡é¢˜ About my life, I hope I can establish a life-long friendship with my best friends, keep close relationship with my families, and face future challenges with my beloved.
